name: Heron-Spiral Downlight: "A Thousand Wondrous Vistas"
description: A magnificent, intricately designed four-sided lantern featuring a lampshade in the traditional style of Liyue's overhanging eaves, specially commissioned by the Ministry of Civil Affairs in celebration of the Lantern Rite. Inside, it houses a rotating mechanism and various vibrant scenic panels, and it connects externally to a Launch Tube. When lit, the scenes within will gradually begin to spin, presenting to the viewer an ever-changing procession of stunning sights.
